```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, include = FALSE}
x <- read_csv("wsb.csv")
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
# Current problem: The webscraping script needs to convert all tickers to uppercase.
data <- x %>%
  select(Ticker) %>%
  group_by(Ticker) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))

data

```
